page.title: 06PLAYGROUND GAME-SQUARES
page.content: One of the most popular games played in Meethill playground is squares. Squares is a good game which requires good hand control. There is one big square in which there are 4 little squares. The squares are numbered 1_4 and a person stands on each square. The person standing on square 4 starts. He bounces the ball a few times, then he aims for any other square. When it reaches an opponent's square the opponent is allowed to let it bounce once. Then he tries to bounce it into another square. if he misses it and lets it bounce twice or lets it bounce out of the square he is out.Originally this game was taught to a group of Peterhead pupils at a school camp by a P.E. teacher from New Zealand.
